page.title: 17GOOLE CHILD'S VIEW OF SCHOOL
page.content: School is a very{important}part of a child's life since nowadays it provides many{opportunities}to learn. Many youngsters' lives revolve around school since it provides the backbone of the{social}structure of their existence. At school there is an atmosphere suitable for{working}whereas at home it is far more relaxed.This difference can create{problems}at home which affect schoolwork and behaviour in lessons and cause conflict with teachers.{Homework,}depending on the ability of the child, can last a long time which also causes a lot of {stress. The various subjects can only be made interesting by the teacher's attitudes and methods. I like a{teacher}who is strict, has a sense of humour and makes learning enjoyable.
